```{r}
library(mdsr)
library(RMySQL)
db <- dbConnect_scidb(dbname = "imdb")
```

```{r}
db %>%
  dbGetQuery("SELECT t.id, title, kind_id, production_year, link_type_id  
FROM title t
JOIN movie_link m 
ON t.id = linked_movie_id
WHERE kind_id = 1;")
```
